languages.text: {n}Эльдар пристально оглядывает Каллигоса.{/n} "После всего, что элантах сделал{mf||а} для моих сородичей, я готов ответить на {mf|его|ее} вопросы. Но ты, мон-кай, лучше не делай резких движений".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдар пристально оглядывает Каллигоса.{/n} "После всего, что элантах сделал для моих сородичей, я готов ответить на {mf|его|ее} вопросы. Но ты, мон-кай, лучше не делай резких движений".
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}The Aeldari watches Calligos closely.{/n} "After everything the elantach has done for my people, I am willing to answer {mf|his|her} questions. But you had better not make any sudden moves, mon-keigh."

languages.text: {n}El Aeldari vigila atentamente a Calligos.{/n} «Después de todo lo que {mf|el|la} elantach ha hecho por mi gente, estoy dispuesto a responder sus preguntas. Pero más vale que no realices ningún movimiento brusco, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari watches Calligos closely.{/n} "After everything the elantach has done for my people, I am willing to answer {mf|his|her} questions. But you had better not make any sudden moves, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Aeldari vigila atentamente a Calligos.{/n} «Después de todo lo que {mf|el|la} elantach ha hecho por mi gente, estoy dispuesto a responder sus preguntas. Pero más vale que no realices ningún movimiento brusco, mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}艾达灵族紧紧地盯着卡里戈斯。{/n}“考虑到外界人为我的人民所做的一切，我愿意回答{mf|他|她}的问题。但你最好不要轻举妄动，猴子。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari watches Calligos closely.{/n} "After everything the elantach has done for my people, I am willing to answer {mf|his|her} questions. But you had better not make any sudden moves, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾达灵族紧紧地盯着卡里戈斯。{/n}“考虑到外界人为我的人民所做的一切，我愿意回答{mf|他|她}的问题。但你最好不要轻举妄动，猴子。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}L'Aeldari observe Calligos attentivement.{/n} « Après tout ce que l'elantach a fait pour mon peuple, j'accepte de répondre à ses questions. Quant à vous, mon-keigh, je vous déconseille de faire des gestes brusques. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari watches Calligos closely.{/n} "After everything the elantach has done for my people, I am willing to answer {mf|his|her} questions. But you had better not make any sudden moves, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Aeldari observe Calligos attentivement.{/n} « Après tout ce que l'elantach a fait pour mon peuple, j'accepte de répondre à ses questions. Quant à vous, mon-keigh, je vous déconseille de faire des gestes brusques. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}アエルダリは、カリゴスをじっと見ている。{/n}「エランタが我が民のためにしてくれたことを思えば、私は喜んでその質問に答えよう。だが、性急な動きは慎むのだな、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari watches Calligos closely.{/n} "After everything the elantach has done for my people, I am willing to answer {mf|his|her} questions. But you had better not make any sudden moves, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリは、カリゴスをじっと見ている。{/n}「エランタが我が民のためにしてくれたことを思えば、私は喜んでその質問に答えよう。だが、性急な動きは慎むのだな、モン＝ケイ」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Der Aeldari beobachtet Calligos genau.{/n} "Nach allem, was Elantach für mein Volk getan hat, bin ich bereit, {mf|seine|ihre} Fragen zu beantworten. Doch Ihr solltet lieber keine plötzlichen Bewegungen machen, Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari watches Calligos closely.{/n} "After everything the elantach has done for my people, I am willing to answer {mf|his|her} questions. But you had better not make any sudden moves, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aeldari beobachtet Calligos genau.{/n} "Nach allem, was Elantach für mein Volk getan hat, bin ich bereit, {mf|seine|ihre} Fragen zu beantworten. Doch Ihr solltet lieber keine plötzlichen Bewegungen machen, Chem-Pan-Sey."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Aeldari, Calligos'u dikkatle izliyor.{/n} "Elantach'ın halkım için yaptığı onca şeyden sonra onun sorularına cevap vermeye hazırım. Ancak ani hareketler yapmasan iyi edersin mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari watches Calligos closely.{/n} "After everything the elantach has done for my people, I am willing to answer {mf|his|her} questions. But you had better not make any sudden moves, mon-keigh."

traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
